text: As much as everyone loves heading back to school and getting their education on, kissing summer goodbye and saying hello to a new semester can be a bummer. But there's a light at the end of this algebra-filled tunnel: school is also a great opportunity to reconnect with friends, make new memories, and –– if you're in the movie Footloose –– dance super intensely for no apparent reason. With that in mind, check out 13 movies that will definitely get you psyched for school.
title: 13 Best Back-to-School Movies That'll Get You Excited for the School Year

meta_data.author: Condé Nast
meta_data.description: We've rounded up the best back-to-school movies to make you more excited (and less stressed) about gearing up for the year ahead. Check them out.
